intro.body: Is your "site builder" confusing editors and frustrating devs? Time to try tools designed specifically for your area of focus.

editor.title: Edit right on the page (Coming soon)
editor.body: Seriously, give it a shot! You can edit this text directly. That's how easy it will be to maintain the content on your site.

setup.title: Out-of-the-Box
setup.body: Ship sites with a lightweight Content Management System. No extra software is needed to handoff to editors.

setup.title: Git Backend
setup.body: Ditch the SQL headaches and simply connect to a Git backend. Finally content editors and developers can speak the same language.

setup.title: Content Structure
setup.body: There are no required fields or content types in Plenti. You define whatever structure works best for you and your project.

setup.title: Svelte Components
setup.body: Build with a fast and easy to understand component framework. Enjoy automatic HTML fallbacks for your single page apps.

setup.title: Commandline Tool
setup.body: Save time with automatic scaffolding for repetitive tasks. The CLI tool doesn't require internet access or dependencies.

cta.title: Plenti is 100% Free and Open Source

meta.desc: A Svelte SSG with Golang backend for the JAMstack
